page.title: 05ST.JOSEPH'S R.C.SCHOOL
page.content:
School is big.We have computers .There are 9 class rooms.And there are about 200 children.There are 11 teachers.We have hymns and singing with Miss Scarff. At school thereis a Chequerboard garden. Each class has 6 squares. There is not very big playground.We have an infant playground. There is a car park.
We go swimming with the school. There is a headmasters room and a secretarys room. There are school dinners and pack lunches and home dinners. School starts at 9.00. We go home at 3.45. We have 20 minutes play time There is a tree in the field. We have P.E. in the hall on a Wednesday and Friday
